descriptionHtml:
If you like this mod, please endorse it. 
This motivates us to continue the work :-)

====================
Description
====================

Werewolves who can not heal?

Since launching the game I was frustrated with the werewolves of the game.

This plugin replaces the effect Damage Heal Rate 100% of the werewolves by the effect Fortify Heal Rate.

I made two plugins, each with a level of heal rate:
Better Werewolf 1.75.esp
Better Werewolf 4.5.esp
* The normal heal rate is 0.70, so the first plugin gives a heal rate equivalent to 2.5x the normal rate.
The second plugin gives a rate equivalent to heal rate of stamina regeneration rate.

This plugin also changes the time that you should expect to become a werewolf, so you can transform at will.

There is a similar plugin where i got the idea of the cooldown, this plugin is:
No Werewolf Form Cooldown
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2907

LFox, Thank you for the \"No Werewolf Form Cooldown\" Mod.

====================
compatibility
====================

This mod is not compatible with mods that alter these effects, such as Heal Rate and Cooldown  of beast form.

====================
bugs
====================
None that I know of.

====================
Installation
====================

Extract the contents of .zip file in Skyrim/Data and check the plugin in game launcher.

====================
uninstall
====================

Simply uncheck the plugin in the game launcher.
